page.title: 14TRAFFIC SURVEY ON THE A64
page.content: We carried out a traffic survey on the A64 York to Scarborough road near Hopgrove roundabout,on a Monday afternoon in July 1985. In one hour a total of 669 vehicles passed our census point travelling in an Easterly direction whilst 378 vehicles travelled in a Westerly direction.This is very surprising because at that time of the day (between 4 and 5pm) we would have thought most traffic would be returning from the coast rather than travelling towards it. Here are our results of the eastbound survey:- BUSES 5 TRACTORS 8 VANS 52 AMBULANCE 3 LORRIES 64 MOTOR BIKES 12 ARMY V'CLE 5 CYCLES 0 CARAVANS 4 CARS 516 TOTAL 669 77% of the vehicles were cars.
